name: Hard Drive (The Wrong John)
description:
Hard Drive is a driving game with touch support. Simply touch the left and right sides of the screen to steer.  You can also use your mouse position to steer but touch is preferable.

It might work on your mobile.  It did on mine! Just wait and ignore all the error messages. Let me know.

Thanks to GameDevTV for all the tutorials and Chamferbox for the statue
